## ğŸ’¡ Pro Tips

### First-Time Users

- Start with QUICK_START.md (don't skip!)
- Skim IMPLEMENTATION_PR.md (don't read word-for-word yet)
- Use PROJECT_BOARD.md daily (your task list)

### During Development

- Keep PROJECT_BOARD.md open (track progress)
- Reference IMPLEMENTATION_PR.md (technical details)
- Update checklists daily (stay organized)

### Before Committing

- Use PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md (will auto-load)
- Check all checklists
- Run all tests
